name: Valkyrie
description: The Valkyrie is a powerful celestial creature with impressive combat skills, armed with a longsword and a spear. It embodies a fierce warrior's presence, emanating an aura that inspires allies.
memorable: Its ability to reincarnate fallen allies as gladiators makes it a crucial force on the battlefield.
goals: To protect allies and turn the tide of battle in favor of its companions.
relations: Often associated with heroic spirits and warriors
environment: Found in celestial realms or on battlefields.
strengths: High armor class and hit points, along with powerful radiant damage attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerability to magical damage types not specified in its resistances.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack to strike with a longsword and spear or unleash devastating radiant bolts.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Valor grants allies advantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
senses: Possesses truesight with a range of 60 feet and has high passive perception of 18.
skills: Noteworthy skill in Perception with a +8 modifier.
additional_information: Immortal Nature allows it to remain active indefinitely.
Magic Resistance provides advantage against spells and magical effects.
Healing Touch can restore hit points and remove conditions.
Gaze of Doom can inflict fear on enemies, hindering their effectiveness.
Radiant Weapons ensure all its attacks deal additional radiant damage.
test_queries: powerful celestial warrior with healing abilities
angelic being that aids fallen allies
